subject: World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: After a trip to New Zealand with the U.S. team for the Rugby World Cup, Mike Petri of Brooklyn wants to believe the game has a future in this country.
snippet: After a trip to New Zealand with the U.S. team for the Rugby World Cup, Mike Petri of Brooklyn wants to believe the game has a future in this country.
